\begin{document}

\newenvironment{abstractHeader}[5]{
	\begin{spacing}{-0.5}
		\begin{center} 
		\	textbf{\LARGE{}ABSTRACT\LARGE} 
		\end{center}
	\end{spacing}
	\noindent \rule{1\columnwidth}{0.5pt}
}
	
{
	\noindent \rule{1\columnwidth}{0.5pt}
	\vspace*{5mm}
	\pagenumbering{gobble}% Remove page numbers (and reset to 1)
}



\abstractHeader{sadasdsa}

\input{Abstract.tex}
\end{document}
